Title: Mammo
Actors: Farida Jalal, Surekha Sikri, Amit Phalke
Plot: 13 year old Riyaz lives a poor lifestyle in Bombay, India, with his grandmother, Fayyuzi, and her sister, Mehmooda alias Mammo. Quite outspoken and embittered over his dad abandoning him, Riyaz does not have many friends, save for...
